post.body: Lulz. At least you didn't have to do it both ways.
wooooo! Now you ARE the most dangerous person in the room. We should start calling u by another name. Van damme?
Danke! IBM. You know where you're headed?
I might be able to help. Ping for details.
Precisely!
Yah IBM!
you headed to school? A big, red school perhaps? I'm driving alongside you, followin tweets for hours.
nope, big red on the other hill. You do?
I quite enjoy watching movies and lazing about with my family. Call me a homebody then, I'll take it!
Harry Bella Fonte!
samurai tastes fine but the servings are microscopic, and def not priced accordingly. Go on t/r, I believe it's half price then.
The answer, unfortunately, is a resounding no. :(
@leoport @austinlin @gsruss Good Luck!
hehe, they're a peculiar lot. But they're cool, too. (in their own way, lulz)
I say "Good Riddance" to them! Jaded...
I watched your video, and now you are famous. Woo!
Did it?
Ohhh. Nvermind. Goodluck!
Whats the significance of 3:00pm PST?
Can you please be careful and quit texting while you're driving through a blizzard?! "Cars in ditches." Sheesh.
Asia Noodle house! Sooooo good!
Aw maaaan. Are you gonna interview?
there's a subway line right by the airtrain to jfk. Take the airtrain straight to the subway, E line, skip gridlock. :)
Nyaaaaw. :)
Where did you go? And, Ithaca will always be here on the weekends, you just have to miss it enough to make the 5 hr trip. :)
zomg-- preshus!!
Absolutely not ok! You're gonna give me a heart attack. An emoticon, even!!
I am incredibly jealous.
Those things used to be the shiz-nit. You are not alone. :)
it's funny how you end up in my twinkle stream no matter where I am. Actually...it's kind of weird. ;)
How was it? Tell me eeeverything.
What?! Go Big Blue! Good luck.
Yes! Must to get completely clean for the new year. Oh, Russian traditions!
I am biting my nails like a mad woman. Trying to be productive stresses me out.
I wonder if my internet behavioral residue smells ok.
Who'da thought it'd be hard to concentrate if the 1 empty table you managed to score in the ENG buildin is where they make sammies w/ bacon?
Just had my last class at Miyake! The Prof paid for a huge sushi feast and even a round of sake bombs. Best class ever, fo 'sho.
Going to be a consultant when I grow up. Growing up begins early next year.
Why does Jetblue have to have an amazing fare sale from NYC to SFO that starts 4 days after I need to be there? Rawr.
On the road to Ithaca, 4 of us in the car, gray and rainy outside.
Everything I know about eating is going out the window for dinner. Have plans to go to the seafood buffet. My dad can roll me out after.
Lars and the Real Girl is absolutely my new favorite movie. It was sweet, charming, and completely wonderful. Rent it!
My extended family makes more noise than am entire elementary school. Crazy. Can we say headache?
The girl next to me prefers clik clicking an AIM convo on her BB than having a quiet one on the open MBPro in front of her. What a butthole.
Thoughts while studying: Indian food, yum, sushi, yum, but not at miyake, yuk, home fries at ABC, yum, broccolis, yum, mexican, yum, yumm...
It's cool to spend Saturday at the library. Doi. http://snipurl.com/7zwp9
FmyI: Ppl who write bad stuff about future workplace on msg boards r just unhappy & seeking attn. Also, msg boards not conducive to studyin.
Hail all hail, Cornell.
My parents are coming in 2 hours. My room is a mess. Fail.
Gonna go to the campus store to buy Cornell branded stuff. Now that Cornell is finished, I want a lot of Cornell stuff. Hm.
Ended up having lunch w/ Prof, he paid for ABC Cafe, not a loss after all. Then he drove me home and his car slid into and on the curb. Bad.
Trekked from West to Mann this morning to meet a Prof who "really wanted to talk" to me. Got there. "Something came up." Trekked back. Argh.
Got an itunes gift card for proctoring-- now @leoport and I have a good reason to blow $$ renting movies through itunes all the time!
I'm proctoring for an exam. Not much to do but chew gum an stare at the students. Which I am doing, and creepily.
I finished school and came home to a surprise gift box: it contained a welcome to my new life from the new job. Aw. http://snipurl.com/8qhq4
Still looking, but found 2 great places yesterday. Things looking better! :)
The search begins! 5 properties to see today. Strapping on my handy dandy bullshit-o-meter. Landlords better not mess with me. I'm from NY!
I've arrived! Waiting for baggage, and @leoport. http://snipurl.com/9e4dr
Lesson learned. Always go for the direct flight, pay the extra dollaz. Delays bug the shiz out of me.
JFK --> LAX-->SFO. Sleepy. Good thing I brought my critterpilla. http://snipurl.com/9d7vt
Preparing my iPhone with all new music for tomorrow's long flight-- JFK->SFO for the apartment hunt.
Happy New Year! C Novim Godom!
My dad made me a puzzle and then showed me how to solve it. Awe.Some. http://snipurl.com/9bpma
Last minute New Years shopping actually worked! The gifts are under the imaginary tree. :)
WHOA! I didn't rlly get what was going on until a couple minutes in...but watch the vid-- it's worth it! http://tinyurl.com/842369
Sitting in bed with a runny nose, and the first in the womens murder club series by Patterson. Not a bad night.
It is a surprising 55 degree day in NYC.
